questions.question_text: Which of the following are tiers of software reconciliation results? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: DE
Correct answer is definitely D and E
Should be D E: Software model, Software Product, Software Pulisher, License Metric
Correct Answer D, E - Sam pro - 241
Correct Answer D, E. The 4 tiers of Reconciliation Results are Software Publisher Results, Software Product Results, Software Model Results , License Metric Results. Page 242 - SAM Book.

questions.question_text: Baseline license metrics are defined for which of the following? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ADF
Out of all available records from 'samp_sw_license_metric' where Metric Group is "Common" (full list below), it's definitely A-D-F.

Device CAL
Per Core
Per Device
Per Named Device
Per Named User
Per Processor
Per User
Resource Consumption
User CAL
User/Device CAL
ADF - correct! User, Device, Processor, and Core are the 4 baseline license metrics. Pg 200 SAM Book.

questions.question_text: Which of the following are valid Remediation Options on the License Workbench after reconciliation has been run? (Choose three.)

discussion.content: B,C,D - per SAM Book page 370. Software Remediation includes: Purchase Rights, Remove Allocations, Create Allocations, Remove Unallocated Installs, Remove Unlicensed Installs.

questions.question_text: Which of the following are valid States of Remediation Options on the License Workbench after reconciliation has been run? (Choose three.)

discussion.content: A, B, E - per SAM Book pg 371 - Remediation Options Status includes: New, Complete, In Progress, and Void.

choices.A: Software installations that are unlicensed and unallocated
choices.D: Software installations that are not normalized
choices.E: Software installations that are unauthorized for use

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: E
E. Software installations that are unauthorized for use
